subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In a chilly ballpark that felt far removed from the festive atmosphere of opening day, the Yankees used a late comeback to overcome a strong outing by the Blue Jays’ R. A. Dickey.
snippet: In a chilly ballpark that felt far removed from the festive atmosphere of opening day, the Yankees used a late comeback to overcome a strong outing by the Blue Jays’ R. A. Dickey.
